Package com.g1.mychess.tournament.controller

Class TournamentController

java.lang.Object
com.g1.mychess.tournament.controller.TournamentController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/v1/tournaments") public class TournamentController extends Object
REST controller for managing tournaments.
